The first missle strikes a rock sending shrapnel into Ice. Her thick hide t=
ook most of the abuse but she did have cuts and scratches. the second hit i=
n front of her feat forcing her back. dust and dirt temporarily impaired he=
r senses but her mental abilities warned her of the others intentions. Ice =
transforms to Owl mode and launches herself skyward out of the way of the w=
ave beam. She flew toward Razor Claw planning to use his shield to protect =
her too. Horn Drills shots strike her before she can get to safety, she plu=
mets to the ground transforming to her sort of robot mode before hitting. S=
he tried to control her pain but her emotions soon turned to fear. She trie=
d to use her telekinetic powers to deflect the other blast but couldn't fin=
d anything solid to grab hold of. the blast was ready to hit her when it su=
ddenly disipated. Ice opened her eyes and saw a ball of energy in front of =
her, thinking it was another blast heading towards her she yells in terror =
"Get away from me." the ball of negative ionic energy hurtled toward Grenad=
e and Beholder2.

Razor Claw saw Ice go down and rushed to her side. Seeing=
 she was alright he charged at Gigas head firs in a ramming attempt.
  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent=
: Friday, December 15, 2000 8:17 PM
  Subject: Re: Cross Fire


  Kracken a=
imed at Ice.

  Kracken: Yo! That one will be good!

  Kracken fires 2 miss=
iles at Ice. Gigas fires his wave beams at Ice. Horn Drill fires at Ice, Gr=
enade and Beholder 2 join their blasted together into one, both of them hol=
ding the large gun, and fire it at Ice...
    ----- Original Message ----- =

    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, Decemb=
er 15, 2000 5:16 AM
    Subject: Re: Cross Fire


    Razor Claws knocked b=
ack after being caugh off gaurd by the first missle. He hits the ground lea=
ving a skid mark across the ground, He roared with pain as shrapnel from ot=
her missles hit around him. He rolled back to his feat creating his forcefi=
eld. As long as his feat remained planted the shots wouldn't be able to pen=
etrate. "Ice, Lunarpine, I've got them distracted, any time you'd like to j=
oin the fun, I'm ready to Party." He shouts over his comm. He knew that his=
 teamates had thier paws full no matter where they were.
      ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
Sent: Thursday, December 14, 2000 9:39 AM
      Subject: Re: Cross Fire


 =
     The Mini-Mafia split back up again. Kracken sees Razorclaw.

      Kra=
cken: I won't ask. Hey! Look! Razorclaw! Good target, mob! Start with one, =
don't target another till he's done!

      Kracken fires 2 missiles at Raz=
orclaw. Horn Dril fires a drill missile, with the power of about 2 missiles=
 because it's packed with acidic material and explosives and just waiting t=
o explode, and he fired this single missile at Razorclaw. Gigas fires a bol=
t of electricity from his hand at Razorclaw. Grenade shoots a fireball at R=
azorclaw. Beholder 2 fires 3 beams, they travel in waves toward Razorclaw..=
.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Alloran2@... 
   =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, December 14, 2000 8:54=
 AM
        Subject: Re: Cross Fire


        OOC: No, 2 missles out of one=
 missle luancher.  If you have two, than you can 
        2 from each of th=
em.  Oh, sorry, didnt know what EMPs did. I'll take that 
        back. 

 =

:: 

        ::He dodges the missles but gets hit by a charge andthe optic =
blasts.  he 
        fires 2 missles at Hot Rod.  Godfather uses his jetpac=
k to go over all the 
        shots.  Staying in the air, he fired 15 shots=
 from his pistol at Teltoli.  
        Hellbat gets knocked out from the EM=
P.  Hearing what FZ said, Sharpedge opens 
        up a comm to the Mafia::=
 
        Sharpedge: Mafia, do not for Mobster yet.  We must wait until the=
y are 
        weakened! Zardus' orders. 
        ::Treadshot transforms to=
 tank mode and lobbed 2 missles at Razor Claw. Torca 
        hears Klant's=
 words:: 
        Torca: Thats alright, well wait here till you ARE ready. =

rom 
        each of his 2 guns at Megaton::
